definitions.definition: A marriage ceremony ; a ritual officially celebrating the beginning of a marriage .
examples: Her announcement was quite a surprise, coming a month after she published the words "I hate weddings with a passion and a fury I can only partially explain rationally."

definitions.definition: The joining of two or more parts.

main_definition: A marriage ceremony ; a ritual officially celebrating the beginning of a marriage .
secondary_definitions: ( idiomatic ) The joining of two or more parts.
